title: koDu koDu
sahitya:
koDu koDu koDu koDu ragA koDu maDayadiruva cIregaLa koDu


caraNam 1    baNDu mADadiru bhAvajanayyane nIraja nAbhane dayamADO
    caraNam 2    gatiyarellaru gullu mADuvaru dInanAthane dayamADO
    caraNam 3    sura honne maravEri aDagida nipuNane Ananda bharitane dayamADO
    caraNam 4    mAnava seLedu mamateli bigida puNDarIkAkSane dayamADO
    caraNam 5    purAtana puruSA puNDarIkAkSanE purandara viTTalane dayamADO
